text: The 1947 season was Wisła Krakóws 39th year as a club. ==Friendlies== ===Mixed teams=== ==Polish Football Championship== ===Group stage=== ===Final round=== ==Squad, appearances and goals== |- |} ===Goalscorers=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%; text-align: center;" |- !width=60|Place !width=60|Position !width=60|Nation !width=150|Name !width=80|Mistrzostwa Polski |- |1 ||FW||||Mieczysław Gracz|| 37 |- |2 ||FW||||Józef Kohut|| 34 |- |3 ||MF||||Władysław Giergiel|| 10 |- |4 ||FW||||Mieczysław Rupa|| 9 |- |5 ||FW||||Kazimierz Cisowski|| 8 |- |6 ||FW||||Artur Woźniak|| 7 |- |7 ||MF||||Leszek Snopkowski|| 1 |- |7 ||FW||||Zbigniew Jaskowski|| 1 |- |7 ||FW||||Władysław Filek|| 1 |- |7 ||FW||||Mieczysław Bąkowski|| 1 |- |7 ||DF||||Tadeusz Legutko|| 1 |- |colspan="3"| |TOTALS |110 |} ===Disciplinary record=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 100%; text-align: center;" |- |rowspan="2" width="20%" align="center"|Name |rowspan="2" width="10%" align="center"|Nation |rowspan="2" width="10%" align="center"|Position |colspan="1" align="center"|Mistrzostwa Polski |colspan="1" align="center"|Total |- !width=60 style="background: #FF8888"| !width=60 style="background: #FF8888"| |- |Władysław Giergiel||||MF|| 1 || 1 |} ==External links== *1947 Wisła Kraków season at historiawisly.pl Category:Wisła Kraków seasons Category:Association football clubs 1947 season Wisla
